H0.text: What former X-Factor contestant had a top ten hit album called Picture Of You in 2007. Leon Jackson

H1.text: What former X-Factor contestant had a top ten hit album called Picture Of You in 2007. Rhydian Roberts

H2.text: What former X-Factor contestant had a top ten hit album called Picture Of You in 2007. Same Difference

H3.text: What former X-Factor contestant had a top ten hit album called Picture Of You in 2007. Ben Mills

A4.text: Same Difference's debut album, Pop, was released on 1 December 2008.

A5.text: Benjamin Collett Mills' debut album, Picture of You, was released on 12 March 2007.

A6.text: The album achieved the BPI Gold status award.
